name: Rencord simulator (Christmas edition)
description:
Introducing a new top of the art simulation of real life... RENCORD SIMULATOR.
Experience what it's like to be apart of the cult book club, includes all your favourite characters and much needed features such as Ren and the ability to piss.

Made for the sexy people of rencord during a christmas event :kiss_mm:

Features

- Vehicular manslaughter
- Piss on people
- Gun
- Uhhhhhhh
- Murder
- Hot tub stream
- Ren
- Moon

Controls

WASD - movement
Shift - Sprint
Space - jump
E - holster and unholster gun
Left click - interact and shoot
Escape - pause menu
F - flashlight
P - piss

Check out Ren here

Updates may or may not happen, this game was a quickly thrown together flaming pile of hell that was made within a week or two within my spare time

Background music from here
